title: authors
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: Amy Kendig, Christopher Wojan, Thomas Thrasher

title: location
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: Big Oaks National Wildlife Refuge, Madison, IN, USA

title: plot
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: experimental plot, which corresponds to planting treatment (1 - 10)

title: ID
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: plant ID (A = focal adult, other = background)

title: leaves_tot
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: number of leaves on a tiller

title: leaves_infec
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: number of leaves with at least two lesions on that same tiller

title: Bp_spots
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: indicator variable of whether or not Elymus individuals appeared to have Bipolaris infection (leopard-like spots)

title: scan
ev-disease-may-2019-density-exp: indicator variable of whether or not a leaf was collected for scanning
